# Stroke Prediction ML Classification Project

This project implements 6 machine learning classification models for stroke prediction with comprehensive evaluation metrics and a Streamlit web application.

## Project Structure
- model/ - Contains model training notebooks and saved models
- data/ - Dataset storage
- app.py - Streamlit web application
- requirements.txt - Python dependencies
- README.md - Complete documentation

## Models Implemented
1. Logistic Regression
2. Decision Tree Classifier
3. K-Nearest Neighbor Classifier
4. Naive Bayes Classifier
5. Random Forest (Ensemble)
6. XGBoost (Ensemble)

## Evaluation Metrics
- Accuracy
- AUC Score
- Precision
- Recall
- F1 Score
- Matthews Correlation Coefficient (MCC)
